definition: containing or made of or resembling or characteristic of a metal, a mixture containing two or more metallic elements or metallic and nonmetallic elements usually fused together or dissolving into each other when molten, cover with metal
details:
adjective
- containing or made of or resembling or characteristic of a metal
= synonyms: metallic
noun
- a mixture containing two or more metallic elements or metallic and nonmetallic elements usually fused together or dissolving into each other when molten
= synonyms: alloy
- any of several chemical elements that are usually shiny solids that conduct heat or electricity and can be formed into sheets etc.
= synonyms: metallic element
verb
- cover with metal
